description: Set the blend amount for the specified eqIndex, for eqIndex 0 if none is specified. Automatically sets the blend amount of the other eqIndex to 1-eqLerp.

params.name: eqLerp
description: Float value from 0 to 1, percentage of specified eqIndex, 0 if none specified.

params.name: eqIndex
description: The EQ index to use (0 and 1).

example: level.player setEqLerp(0.25, 1); // Now using 25% of EQ 1 and 75% of EQ 0
